messages.message:
Hey team are these feedback all Beta, hence being disabled. (I’m on version 24.14)
Is there guidance on which features I can enable for my customer.
And which ones should remain off? (`LLM selection on Build` for example)
FYI @hannah @Tom Deaney
None of these preview features are available to external users. Are you asking which one you can turn on to demo to the user?
Yes @Orlando these features only work for @instabase.com email address. Turning these on only turns them on for your account. Not for the organization.
In future, we will have org feature flags for features that are available to be turned on for an org (this will be done through the org page), but we have none available right now.
Is it worth adding a sentence in the UI to make it clear that these features are only available to IB users (that only IB users can see)?
yep, we'll have that in the new feature flag system.
